The conversation includes concerns about the FBI not following up on evidence and a potential cover-up, with the statement: 'They never got back to me'.
The speaker mentions having 'connected a lot of dots that are pretty frightening' regarding the Epstein case.
The document is a digital screenshot showing a mix of personal messaging and tab titles related to the Epstein case and other scandals.
